app.name: Order Viewer
app.short_description: View orders & products related to a user.
app.long_description: The app lets agents search through or sort orders, view order attributes, detail and events from the ticket sidebar

object_1.label: Object 1 name
object_1.helpText: The name of the object linked to the user (e.g: order). This should also be this object type's key.

user_to_object.label: Relationship type 1
user_to_object.helpText: The relationship type key between the user and the object 1

object_2.label: Object 2 name
object_2.helpText: The name of the second object linked to the first object (e.g: product). This should also be this object type's key.

object_to_object.label: Relationship type 2
object_to_object.helpText: The relationship type key between object 1 and object 2
